:::Ramjet:::

::He nods when he hears Cygnar::
Ramjet: Well, I dont mean to brag, but I've been a Destron for a long time.  
I already lead a merge group.  I think i would make a good leader.  If thats 
alright with you, you can be my second-in-command and tactical advisor. Does 
that sound good to you?

--part1_7d.11f836be.27d9a45b_boundary
